attributes.action: prevent further personal interference in the operation of this website
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The purpose of this website is to petition the Prime Minister. It should not be the case, therefore, that the most popular petition is interfered with by the PM on the grounds that he does not like it. (Ref: IDcards)

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
